channel.title: Problem Jaring a 657 Client
channel.description:
Hello
I've set the main class to client but I get an error:
[code]Could not find main class: client. Program will exit.[/code]
Now just looking at the run.bat differences between the old 602 client and the 657 client, I notice it calls on some class paths. I believe. I'm just not sure what to put as my main class and the other settings to get it to work correctly.
Anyone figured this out?

item.title: Problem Jaring a 657 Client
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Yes the input directory is the same as where the main class is. It works fine for a 602 client, just not a 657.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Jaring a 657 Client
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Ok, Have you put the manifest in the folder where the client.class is located that could be the problem.

Read full topic
